name: Burst Squad
description:
Burst Squad

Online multiplayer fps game. earn points by killing enemies. be the best you!
Battle against players in multiple terrains from outdoor environments to indoors. Battles allowing absolute chaos.
TDM, Conquest game modes.
Online mode, Singleplayer, and AI(Bots)
Classes, weapons, and special powers,
Conflict and War Online.


1 - Primary Weapon
2 - Secondary Weapon
3 - Knife
4 - Grenade

Left Mouse - Fire
Right Mouse- Aim

W,A,S,D - Movement
Q,E - Leaning
G - Throw Grenade
V - Melee Attack
X - Ability
R - Reload
Shift - Run
Control -Crouch

Y - General Chat
U - Team Chat
